chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog 🐸, bless his webbed feet, croaked, "10 PM, Penelope! 💊 Time!" Penelope the chick 🐥, engrossed in staring at a particularly juicy worm 🐛, chirped, "Later, Ferd!" That night, Penelope woke up feeling…square. ⬛ Literally square. Ferdinand just shook his head. "Shoulda taken your anti-shape-shifting meds," he sighed. "Now you'll be stuck like that 'til sunrise." 🤦‍♀️
